conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style cutaway render with clearly defined wall heights and interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D volume, wall thickness, and orthographic-to-perspective transformation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent fidelity to room placement and wall geometry; window placements align perfectly with the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is remarkably accurate in placement and type, including the kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials/colors used to distinguish rooms. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor decorative plant in the top-right bedroom of 3D not present in 2D.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains near-perfect geometric and asset alignment with the original 2D floor plan.
